question: Which among the following statements about the Gangetic Plains is not correct?
option1: It spreads in the countries India and Bangladesh only
option2: It is bounded by the Thar Desert in the West
option3: It borders the surrounding areas of Himalayas.
option4: It is bounded by the Vindhyas and the Satpuras in the South
answer: It spreads in the countries India and Bangladesh only
explanation:
The Gangetic Plains is the large space of level, made by the Ganges River in the northern parts of India. It borders the surrounding areas of Himalayas. It is an important part of the countries of India, Nepal, and Bangladesh.
It is bounded by:
Thar Desert - West
Himalayas - North
Ganges Delta - East
Vindhyas and Satpuras - South
